== Neil Perry ==

=== About Me ===
My name is Neil Perry, and I've been an Ubuntu user since late 2007, starting with GutsyGibbon. I have switched from Ubuntu to Arch a couple of times but always came back to the Ubuntu community. I would like contribute with Ubuntu Community as much as I can.

=== Occupation ===
Currently I'm a content analyst at <nowiki>[[http://www.cinergize.com/|CInergy International]]</nowiki>.
